page.title: 14A TYPICAL 5 YEAR OLD
page.content:
A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A FIVE YEAR OLD BOY IN HERMITAGE, BERKSHIRE.
0600 Wake up. Play in bed. Look at books. 0700 Get up and get dressed. Breakfast of cornflakes, toast and orange juice. Clean teeth. 0830 Leave for school. If fine walk. Taken in car if wet. 0900 School day begins. Likes maths. 1200 Lunch. Favourite menu - sausage, potatoes, krispie cake. 1520 Mother collects from school. Plays with toys. Watches television - likes "Incredible Hulk" best. 1800 Meal with family. Then play with Daddy. Bath and story - favourite - "Thomas the Tank Engine". 1900 Bedtime.
